Responsibility
 

     Feed, oversee, and be an example to your flock.--The ministers of the Word, and others who fill responsible positions, as well as the body of the
40
church, need this spirit of humility and contrition. The apostle Peter writes to those who labor in the gospel: "Feed the flock of God which is among you, taking the oversight thereof, not by constraint, but willingly; not for filthy lucre, but of a ready mind; neither as being lords over God's heritage, but being ensamples to the flock."--RH Dec. 16, 1890.
